code.installcode: $vbulletin->db->hide_errors(); $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `". TABLE_PREFIX ."vsa_chatbox` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `userid` INT(10) NOT NULL, `userip` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `dateline` INT(10) NOT NULL, `message` TEXT NOT NULL, `textprop` TEXT NOT NULL) "); $vbulletin->db->show_errors();

plugin.title: VSa - ChatBox - CT
VSa - ChatBox - IL
VSa - ChatBox - MN

phrasetype.name: GLOBAL
phrasetype.phrase: Users active in last {1} minutes: {2} ({3} members and {4} guests)
Messages older than {1} hours are automatically pruned from ChatBox.
Ask your questions in the forums. The ChatBox is for small talk.
Are you sure to want to delete selected messages?
Are you sure to want to delete ALL messages?
This can not be undone! Proceed with deletion?
Go to last message posted by {1}
No new messages since your last visit
Click here to view all messages
New messages since your last visit: {1}

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Auto prune messages older than X hours - Set X (Blank to disable)
Enable auto-refresh for guests and users not able to post

Messages auto-refresh interval in seconds
Note: Don't set this value too low because of server load / default 10

Show Active users - auto-refresh interval in seconds
Note: Don't set this value too low because of server load / default 30
Automatically add link to ChatBox Full to NavBar
Banned BB Tags (comma separated, example: img, code)
Groups able to moderate ChatBox (comma separated usergroup IDs)
Usergroups NOT able to edit messages (Banned automatically excluded)
Usergroups able to view ChatBox but not post messages
Width of [code], [php] and [html] BB code blocks (in pixels)
ChatBox always collapsed by default (ChatBox Full not affected)
Usergroups NOT able to view ChatBox (comma separated ID list)
Users with post count less than X can not view ChatBox - Set X

Users banned from ChatBox (comma separated UserID list)

Note: When user is banned via menu in ChatBox Archive this field will be automatically updated
Log-out user from ChatBox after X minutes of inactivity
Messages to show in ChatBox/ChatBox Full
Seconds to show "new messages since last visit" stats
Position on page (Disable if you add ChatBox manually in templates)
Reverse message order in CB Archive (newest at bottom)
Reverse message order in ChatBox (newest at bottom)

Show ChatBox on pages (comma separated THIS_SCRIPT locations)
Blank to show on all pages (not recommended because of server load)
Automatically parse smilie codes in messages
Smilies to show on startup (others are loaded when user clicks "More")
Total smilies available (0 to disable smiliebox, 1 to use all smilies)
Messages in last X hours - Set X
Show ChatBox in templates (comma separated template names)
Text sizes available in drop-down menu
Show message time in ChatBox (Archive not affected)
Allow users to delete their own messages
Show Active users - time cut-off (in minutes)

setting.defaultvalue: Black, Gold, Khaki, Orange, LightPink, Salmon, Tomato, Red, Brown, Maroon, DarkGreen, DarkCyan, LightSeaGreen, LawnGreen, MediumSeaGreen, BlueViolet, Cyan, Blue, DodgerBlue, LightSkyBlue, White, DimGray, DarkGray
